sections.general: international code council (icc) special inspector and construction materials technician (cmt)
sections.objective: my objective is to obtain and secure a meaningful position integrating my skills with the expertise of my co-workers, resulting in a successful service provided to the client. additionally, i am eager to gain knowledge through my own hard work and the tutelage of my superiors to earn advancement within the organization.
sections.skills: natural leader who is team oriented with strong desire proficient in microsoft windows, word, excel. succeed in accounting field. general knowledge of gaap that continues to grow through hard â able to communicate effectively both verbally and in work. writing to clients, co-workers, and superiors. 14 years progressively advancing experience in civil construction productive worker in fast-paced, time-sensitive environment, materials testing and inspection. while remaining within budget. constant communication with contractors, craft, and co-workers in courteous team member who works with high levels of collaborative effort to complete task at hand. integrity and professionalism.
